Favorites.title: Favorites - Esdeveniments.cat
Favorites.heading: Favorites
Favorites.subtitle: Only upcoming events are shown. When an event ends, it is automatically removed from favorites.
Favorites.emptyDescription: Tap the heart on an event to save it here. Past events are automatically removed from favorites.

About.metaTitle: About us - Cultural agenda of Catalonia | Esdeveniments.cat
About.metaDescription: Meet the team behind Esdeveniments.cat, the collaborative agenda of concerts, exhibitions, theatre and cultural activities in Catalonia. Free citizen initiative.
About.schemaDescription: Meet the Esdeveniments.cat team and the mission behind the collaborative cultural agenda of Catalonia.
About.heading: Who are we?
About.paragraph1: Esdeveniments.cat is a citizen initiative to easily and quickly see all the cultural events happening in Catalonia.
About.paragraph2: The agenda is collaborative, and anyone organizing a cultural event can publish it <publish>here</publish> on their own.
About.paragraph3: You can follow the cultural agenda on this website or follow us on social networks:
About.contactBody: For partnerships, press, or questions, email us.

News.metaTitle: News and recommendations | What to do in Catalonia - Esdeveniments.cat
News.metaDescription: The latest news, recommendations and cultural plans in Catalonia. Discover concerts, exhibitions, theatre and activities.
News.heading: News
News.intro: The latest news and event recommendations.

EventEdit.title: Edit event
EventEdit.description: Secure panel to edit Esdeveniments.cat events.

PublishPage.metaTitle: Publish your event for free in Catalonia | Cultural agenda - Esdeveniments.cat
PublishPage.metaDescription: Add your concert, exhibition, theatre or activity to the Catalonia agenda. Free and fast publication. Reach thousands of people interested in culture and leisure.
PublishPage.schemaName: Publish a cultural event in Catalonia
PublishPage.schemaDescription: Official form to add concerts, exhibitions, theatre and cultural activities to the collaborative Catalonia agenda.

distance.label: Distance

distance.helperPlace: If you choose a town, we'll calculate the radius from that point. If none is selected, we'll use your current location. Turn on the filter to limit results to a specific radius.

useLocation.regionNotice: You've selected a county. Counties don't have a specific geographic point, so the distance filter can't be used. To use it, select a specific town or your location. You can still filter by date and categories to refine results.

modal.title: Filters

SitemapHeader.title: Historical archive of {label}
SitemapHeader.subtitle: Discover the cultural evolution of {label} year after year. Each link takes you to the events of a specific month.

SitemapContent.title: Cultural events archive
SitemapContent.description: Discover everything that has happened in Catalonia each year. Browse by counties and towns to find the cultural history of the territory.
SitemapContent.footer: The archive contains cultural events from all the counties of Catalonia. Each link takes you to a detailed history organized by years and months.

faq.moreInfoQ: Where can I find more information?

ListPageFaq.title: Frequently asked questions
ListPageFaq.a1: In {capitalizedContext} you'll find concerts, fairs, family activities, and cultural plans updated daily.
ListPageFaq.a2: Yes. Use search, category filters, and distance to discover free activities {contextInline}.
ListPageFaq.a3: Select the "{categoryName}" category to highlight these events {contextInline} and save the agenda to check it often.
